column2:
ggplotly(ggplot(df) +
  annotate_pitch(colour = "white",
                 fill   = "chartreuse4",dimensions = pitch_custom) +
  theme_pitch(aspect_ratio = 700/1400) +
  coord_flip(xlim = c(700, 1085),
              ylim = c(0, 900)) +
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = y), shape = 21,
             fill = "red",
             colour = "red", size = 5) )
